## [Topics](/documentation/Swift/Float16/AdditiveArithmetic-Implementations#topics)

### [Operators](/documentation/Swift/Float16/AdditiveArithmetic-Implementations#Operators)

[`static func + (Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/float16/+(_:))Returns the given number unchanged.[`static func += (inout Self, Self)`](/documentation/swift/float16/+=(_:_:)-17hzy)Adds two values and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable.[`static func -= (inout Self, Self)`](/documentation/swift/float16/-=(_:_:)-4m9c5)Subtracts the second value from the first and stores the difference in the left-hand-side variable.### [Type Properties](/documentation/Swift/Float16/AdditiveArithmetic-Implementations#Type-Properties)

[`static var zero: Self`](/documentation/swift/float16/zero)The zero value.
